effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to inflict an effect chosen according to the terrain.

Terrain        | Effect
-------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------
Building       | Paralyzes target
Cave           | Makes target flinch
Deep water     | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Desert         | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Grass          | Puts target to sleep
Mountain       | Makes target flinch
Road           | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Shallow water  | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Snow           | Freezes target
Tall grass     | Puts target to sleep

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | Effect
-------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------
Courtyard      | Paralyzes target
Crystal        | Makes target flinch
Gateway        | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Magma          | Makes target flinch
Main Street    | Paralyzes target
Neon           | Paralyzes target
Stargazer      | Makes target flinch
Sunny Park     | Puts target to sleep
Sunset         | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Waterfall      | Puts target to sleep
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
根据使用场所不同，
该招式的追加效果也会有所变化。

使う場所で　追加効果が
変化する　攻撃。

The additional effects of this attack depend upon
where it was used.

Attacco che può avere un effetto aggiuntivo
a seconda del luogo in cui si trova chi lo usa.

Ataque cuyos efectos secundarios varían según el
entorno de combate.
Die Wirkung dieser Attacke ist ortsabhängig.

Les effets de cette attaque varient en fonction
de l’environnement.

隨著使用地點的不同，
招式的追加效果也會改變。

사용하는 장소에 따라 추가 효과가
변화하는 공격이다.

つかう　ばしょで　ついかこうか　が
へんかする　こうげき。

使う場所で　追加効果が
変化する　攻撃。
ひ つきちを　つくる　ことも　できる。

An attack whose additional effects
depend upon where it was used.
Can also be used to make a Secret Base.

Attacco che può avere un effetto aggiuntivo
a seconda del luogo in cui si trova chi lo usa.
Serve anche per costruire Basi Segrete.

Ataque cuyos efectos secundarios varían según el 
entorno de combate. También se puede utilizar para 
construir una Base Secreta.

Die Wirkung dieser Attacke ist ortsabhängig.
Sie ermöglicht es außerdem, Geheimbasen
zu errichten.

Les effets de cette attaque varient en fonction
de l’environnement. Permet aussi de créer sa propre 
Base Secrète.

사용하는 장소에 따라 추가 효과가
변화하는 공격이다. 비밀기지를
만드는 것도 할 수 있다.

つかう　ばしょで　ついかこうか　が
へんかする　こうげき。ひ つきちを
つくる　ことも　できる。

秘密の　力で
相手を　攻撃する。使う　場所で
追加効果が　変化する。

The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its additional effects vary
depending on the user’s environment.

Attacco che può avere un effetto aggiuntivo
a seconda del luogo in cui si trova chi lo usa.

Ataque con poder secreto cuyos efectos
secundarios varían según el entorno de combate.

Angriff, der abhängig vom Anwendungsort
einen unterschiedlichen Zusatz-Effekt hat.

Les effets de cette attaque varient en fonction de
l’environnement.

비밀의 힘으로 상대를
공격한다. 사용 장소에 따라
추가 효과가 변화한다.

ひみつの　ちからで
あいてを　こうげきする。つかう　ばしょで
ついかこうかが　へんかする。

The user attacks the target with a
secret power. Its added effects vary
depending on the user’s environment.

secret power. Its added effects vary
depending on the user’s environment.

Les effets de cette attaque varient en
fonction de l’environnement.

depending on the
